properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-DEHIBE
1
He ! fitiavan-dehibe !
Moa fantatrao ?
Miantso anao sy ahy re,
Moa ve renao ?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Manatona izao anio
Mba hodiovina, (anio).
Ny fiainana mandrakizay fidio,
Aza lavina.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
'Lay Tomponao sy ahy koa
'Zao miantso izao ;
Ny fony tena tia tokoa.
O ! ekeonao.
Manatona, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hariva izao ny andro aty
Ka ho lasana,
Madiva hiseho 'lay ary
'Zay andrasanao.
Manatona, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ny famonjena atolotra
O ! mba raisonao ;
Tsy ho ela dia ho fongotra
'Zao rehetra izao.
Manatona, sns.
